channel.title: Groups on BloNo Young Catholics
channel.description: Recent content in Groups on BloNo Young Catholics

item.title: A Treasured Love Story
item.description: Kerri Elson leads a small group that strives to grow in the virtues of faith, hope and charity through using a combination of spiritual reading, Scripture study and group discussion. We pursue genuine community and friendships through our meetings, activities and prayers. We welcome young adult women from all backgrounds and support each other on our faith journeys! Currently we are reading through A Treasured Love Story: Lessons we can learn from St.

item.title: Lauren & Lizzy
item.description: Lauren Booth & Lizzy Oâ€™Brien lead a laid back group studying and striving to build community. They meet every Tuesday 6:30pm-8:00pm at Laurens house. This small group is open to any young adult women and current has an age range of 23-36.

item.title: Rediscovering the Saints
item.description: Chris Dunning is leading a book study of Rediscovering the Saints by Matthew Kelly, for young men.

item.title: Wrestling With God
item.description: We are reading through some of the minor books of the Old Testament, beginning with Esther, every Thursday Evening at Epiphany. Contact Nick Reichmuth for more info.
